EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Chris, Thank you for your follow up! Good luck with school and if you ever have any questions in the future do not hesitate to reach out to me! Thank you and have a great day,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Chris Johnston [mailto:chris@gocmj.com] Sent: Saturday, February 25, 2012 6:01 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Chris Johnston Hello Nicolette, I am sorry for not getting back with you. I have decided to stop my freelance (Hard then some might think) to go back to school and complete my degree. I like your service and I will keep you in mind after school. Thanks, ChrisOn Sun, Jan 8, 2012 at 12:57 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Chris, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC04NiZtZXNzYWdlaWQ9ODYmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD0xMzE2ODI2MzM2JnNlcmlhbD0xMjY0NjM4Mjk3JmVtYWlsaWQ9Y2hyaXNAZ29jbWouY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny0xMDkzMDkzJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUuWa61lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D" target="_blank> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC04NiZtZXNzYWdlaWQ9ODYmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD0xMzE2ODI2MzM2JnNlcmlhbD0xMjY0NjM4Mjk3JmVtYWlsaWQ9Y2hyaXNAZ29jbWouY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny0xMDkzMDkzJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUuWa61lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D" target="_blank> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorEnrollment ManagerMBO Partners t: www.mbopartners.com <tel:%28703%29%20793-6281" target="_blank">(703) 793-6281f: 703.793.6081e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: <span style='color:#353433>
